title: Blog Post
description: A schema representing a blog post, including its author and tags.

id.description: The unique identifier for the post.

title.description: The title of the blog post.

content.description: The main body of the blog post, can contain HTML or Markdown.

authorId.description: The ID of the user who wrote the post. This links to a User entity.

publishedAt.description: The date and time the post was published, in ISO 8601 format.

tags.description: A list of tags associated with the post.

tag.title: Tag
tag.description: A keyword or category for a blog post.
